name: Wisp (Caliber5, AFaurholt)
description:
Wisp is a 2.5D exploration and puzzle game about a Wisp that wakes up in a sci-fi world with no memory of how it got there. The wisp needs to explore the facility it's been stuck in to try to figure out what happened to it. 

In wisp, you will use zip points to teleport through obstacles, solve puzzles and hide from robot turrets. You will need to explore the map to find Keys to open doors to progress.

Controls: 

Mouse: to aim zip point.

left click:  teleport to point.

W,A,S,D: general movement.

LShift: Snappy movement

Esc: close program

Credits:

Programming: AFaurholt
https://afaurholt.itch.io/

Art: Caliber5
caliber5.artstation.com

Sound design: Chepaki
https://chepaki.itch.io/

And a special thanks to Sterling Savoy for the VFX. 
You can find more of his work here https://ssavoy.artstation.com/
